data.eml:eml: Revision of the subgenus Phortica (sensu stricto) (Diptera, Drosophilidae) from East Asia, with assessment of species delimitation using DNA barcodes

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huang, Jia, Gong, Lu, Tsaur, Shun-Chern, Zhu, Lin, An, Keying, Chen, Hongwei (2019): Revision of the subgenus Phortica (sensu stricto) (Diptera, Drosophilidae) from East Asia, with assessment of species delimitation using DNA barcodes. Zootaxa 4678 (1): 1-75, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4678.1.1
